title: Media Covering Up the Truth About UFOs - Best of Coast to Coast AM - 12/29/17
itunes:title: Media Covering Up the Truth About UFOs - Best of Coast to Coast AM - 12/29/17
description:
Guest host Jimmy Church and an open lines caller debate whether there is a secret reason behind the recent move by the mainstream media to cover UFO stories seriously.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com
